CDSCanvas.ErrorBlockName: The block name must be unique
CDSCanvas.ErrorBlockCharacter: The block name cannot contain special characters
CDSCanvas.DragAnImageOrClick: drag an image here or click to select them
CDSCanvas.DragAudioOrClick: drag audio file here or click to select them
CDSCanvas.TheAttributesNameMustBe:
The attribute‚Äôs name can only contain alphanumeric
characters which are letters A-Z, numbers 0-9 and
underscore.
CDSCanvas.TheGlobalKeyMustBe:
The key's name can only contain alphanumeric
characters which are letters A-Z, numbers 0-9 and
underscore.
CDSCanvas.TreatAsAttributeNameTips:
Treat the contents of the above field as the name of an attribute. 
 Useful if you want to assign to this attribute the value of another one.
CDSCanvas.AddAnActionToBlock: Add an action to this block
CDSCanvas.AddAnActionToBlockDescription: Actions are executed in sequence starting from the top block action
CDSCanvas.QuestionDescription: When a user says something similar to a training phrase, {{BRAND_NAME}} matches it to the block
CDSCanvas.QuestionPlaceholderNew: Add user expression and press enter or click ADD
CDSCanvas.UseChatHistoryInPrompt: Use the chat history in the prompt
CDSCanvas.FormatTypeDescription: When JSON mode is turned on, the model's output is ensured to be valid JSON, except for in some edge cases that you should detect and handle appropriately.
CDSCanvas.CitationsDescription: Use this option to get accurate sources of documents used to generate the reply.
CDSCanvas.UseKBNameDescription: Check this option if you want to use this chatbot across different projects.
CDSCanvas.ErrorAutomaticAssign: Errors will be automatically assigned to variable:
CDSCanvas.ApplyAFunctionToValue: Apply a function to the value
CDSCanvas.InsertConstantValueOrChoise: Insert a constant value or choose an attribute
CDSCanvas.AssignUserReplyDescription: Awaits for the user reply and automatically assign it to the selected attribute. If no attribute is selected the reply is automatically assigned to lastUserText
CDSCanvas.AdvancedContextDesctiption: Here you have the most control. Be careful, the native prompt is completely overwritten.
CDSCanvas.AiError: Oops! Something went wrong. Please retry in a few moment.
CDSCanvas.AiQuotaExceeded: Oops! Token quota exceeed. Please upgrade your project
CDSCanvas.AiNoAnswer: Unable to find a relevant answer
CDSCanvas.HiddenMessageDescription: Hidden messages are designed to be a useful tool to debug conversations. They are automatically disabled when your chatbot goes public.
CDSCanvas.NoVariableFound: Nothing found. Please consider changing your search query
CDSCanvas.ChooseBlockDescription: Automatically execute this block when this chatbot joins the conversation
CDSCanvas.ThisRequestNoBody: This request does not have a body
CDSCanvas.TheHeaderContainsMedia: The header contains a Media to customize
CDSCanvas.InsertValidURLOrUpdateFile: Insert a valid URL or update a file
CDSCanvas.NoTemplate: Oops, looks like there is no template.
CDSCanvas.Subject: Subject
CDSCanvas.RequestTimeoutInfo: Set how long a request should wait for a response before timing out. Admitted values range: 1-300k ms
CDSCanvas.AudioFileAllowed: You can only upload *.wav audio format with mono, 8 KHz, with PCM 8bit, PCM 16bit, Alaw or uLaw coding
CDSCanvas.TagsTypingAliasDescription: Please set a comma separated list of tags that the user can type to tag a conversation or a contact
CDSCanvas.IgnoreOperatingHoursDescription:
Check this option if you want to only check agents availability ignoring the General Operating hours settings.
This option is also useful if you want to demand opening and closing hours checking to the If Operating Hours Action, specifing a specific time slot
CDSCanvas.PushTagsToListDescription: Check this option if you want to add tags to global list.
CDSCanvas.ChangeAlphaConnectors: Change alpha of the connectors color

Alert.ErrorMaxOptions: Cannot add another option. Max available options achived ( 0..9, *, # )
Alert.ErrorSingleDigit: Invalid option. Allowed options are 0..9 single digit, *, #
Alert.ErrorAllowedOption: Invalid option. Allowed options are 0..9 single digit, *, #
Alert.ErrorDuplicateDigit: Invalid option. Provided option already exist. Please check and try again

Name: Name
Label: Label

CDSForm.FormDescription: The Forms block allows you to ask more than one question within a single message, making it easier for the customer to provide all the relevant information.
CDSForm.AddAFormToAsk: Add a Form to ask user data
CDSForm.SelectTemplateForm: Select a type of form among those suggested, or create a new one
CDSForm.Label: Label
CDSForm.ConfirmDeleteField: Are you sure you want to delete the field?
CDSForm.ConfirmDeleteForm: Are you sure you want to delete the form?
CDSForm.AreYouSureDeleteField: Are you sure you want to delete the field?
CDSForm.MarkbotLabel: You can use Markbot to format your labels.

InfoMessages.field_name: Give a name to the Form field (ex: name _ User). The name can contain only letters numbers and _
InfoMessages.field_type: Select the type of given that will be inserted in this field (ex: Text).
InfoMessages.field_regex: Insert the personalized regex for control over the inserted data
InfoMessages.field_label: Write a clear label that helps users to enter the correct data (ex: what's your name?)
InfoMessages.field_error: Write an error message if the data entered by the user is not correct

Reply.TITLE: Send a message back to the user
Reply.DESCRIPTION: This action sends back to the user different pieces of contents as simple text or images, buttons, carousels etc

ReplyV2.TITLE: Advanced reply management with input timeout and no-match
ReplyV2.DESCRIPTION: This action sends back to the user different pieces of contents as simple text or images, buttons, carousels etc.

RandomReply.TITLE: Random messages in a set
RandomReply.DESCRIPTION: This action sends back randomly selected messages choosen from a static set

AgentHandoff.TITLE: Transfer to a human
AgentHandoff.DESCRIPTION: This action removes the chatbot from the conversation and moves the flow to a human

Close.TITLE: Close the conversation
Close.DESCRIPTION: This action closes the current conversation

IfOperatingHours.TITLE: Check opening hours
IfOperatingHours.DESCRIPTION: This action checks if the current time is included in some operating hours slot

IfOnlineAgent.TITLE: Check online agents
IfOnlineAgent.DESCRIPTION: This action checks if there is an available agent in the current department

Condition.TITLE: Condition based branching
Condition.DESCRIPTION: This action allows branching based on the specified condition

ConditionElse.TITLE: Condition with else branch
ConditionElse.DESCRIPTION: This action allows branching based on the specified condition with true/false branches

ConnectBlock.DESCRIPTION:
This action moves the flow to the specified block.
Keep in mind that if there are other actions in the current block actions-pipeline they will be executed too, generating a parallel-execution of all the branches affering to each block triggered through this Connect-block action

SetAttribute.TITLE: Create or modify a flow attribute
SetAttribute.DESCRIPTION: With this action you can set the value of a flow attribute or change his type

DeleteAttribute.TITLE: Delete a flow attribute
DeleteAttribute.DESCRIPTION: With this action you can remove the specified attribute

ReplaceBot.TITLE: Replace the current bot with another one
ReplaceBot.DESCRIPTION: Replaces the current chatbot with the specied one

Wait.TITLE: Wait before next action
Wait.DESCRIPTION: Wait the specified amount of time before moving to the next action

WebRequest.TITLE: Invoke HTTP services
WebRequest.DESCRIPTION: Configure and invoke a remote REST API

SendEmail.TITLE: Send email
SendEmail.DESCRIPTION: Sends an email with the specified fields

WhatsAppStatic.TITLE: Send whatsapp message
WhatsAppStatic.DESCRIPTION: Used to configure a Whatsapp message using a template and use the JSON to send massive Whatsapp messages

WhatsAppByAttribute.TITLE: Used to send multi Whatsapp messages
WhatsAppByAttribute.DESCRIPTION: Used to send massive whatsapp messages using a flow

SendWhatsapp.TITLE: Send Whatsapp
SendWhatsapp.DESCRIPTION: Send a Whatsapp message using the specified template

AskTheKnowledgeBase.TITLE: Prompt the KB
AskTheKnowledgeBase.DESCRIPTION: This action prompts the selected knowledge base to find the best suitable answer from the uploaded contents

GPTAssistant.TITLE: Prompt OpenAI Assistants
GPTAssistant.DESCRIPTION: This action allows you to prompt the connected OpenAI Assistant

AiPrompt.TITLE: AI Prompt multiple LLM
AiPrompt.DESCRIPTION: The AI Prompt Action is designed to execute LLM-prompts from multiple AI Providers, including on-prem (based on Ollama).

HiddenMessage.TITLE: Send an hidden message (for the end user)
HiddenMessage.DESCRIPTION: Send a hidden message in the current conversation

CaptureUserReply.TITLE: Capture the user reply
CaptureUserReply.DESCRIPTION: Wait until user replies, then capture and save the user reply in the specified attribute

LeadUpdate.TITLE: Update lead data
LeadUpdate.DESCRIPTION: Update the current lead (the end-user) in the conversation with the specified values

AddTag.TITLE: Add a new tag
AddTag.DESCRIPTION: This action allow chatbot to automatically tags a conversation or a contact during the conversation flow

Qapla.TITLE: Ask an order status to Qapla'

last_user_text.description: The last text the user typed. This is overwritten on each user reply

user_country.description: The user Country as decoded by {{BRAND_NAME}}

user_city.description: The user City as decoded by {{BRAND_NAME}}

user_language.description: The user language decoded on channel

transcript.description: All the conversation messages exchanged with this chatbot during the chat

department_id.description: The ID of the department where this chatbot is activated

department_name.description: 'The name of the department where this chatbot is activated

project_id.description: The name of the project where this chatbot belongs to

last_message_id.description: The unique ID of the last message sent

user_id.description: The user unique ID inside {{BRAND_NAME}} database

user_agent.description: The web user agent where this conversation initiated

chatChannel.description: The channel where this conversation belongs to. Ex. 'web', 'whatsapp', 'facebook', 'telegram'

user_source_page.description: The page where this conversations is runinng. Only available on channel 'web'

chat_url.description: The url of the Chat to send to a colleague to chat with this user. Use 'Invite human' action to invite the human to this chat

user_ip_address.description: The user IP address, when available

flowError.description: The last error generated in the flow

lastUserDocumentAsAttachmentURL.description: Useful if you want to have an URL of the uploaded document that can be displayed in chat and you will always download on click

lastUserDocumentAsInlineURL.description: Document as 'view inline' on click. Useful if you want to use this link in a WebRequest or externar API invocation to get the document content

lastUserDocumentName.description: The name of the document uploaded by the user. It's empy if no document is uploaded

lastUserDocumentType.description: The type of the document uploaded by the user. It's empy if no document is uploaded

lastUserImageURL.description: The public URL to access the image uploaded by the user. It's empy if no image is uploaded

lastUserImageName.description: The name of the image uploaded by the user. It's empy if no image is uploaded

lastUserImageType.description: The type of the image uploaded by the user. It's empy if no image is uploaded

lastUserImageWidth.description: The height in pixel of the image uploaded by the user. It's empy if no image is uploaded

lastUserImageHeight.description: The wdth in pixel of the image uploaded by the user. It's empy if no image is uploaded

userLeadId.description: The user contact Id in {{BRAND_NAME}} Contacts

userCompany.description: The user Company name in {{BRAND_NAME}} Contacts

currentPhoneNumber.description: The user phone used in the current conversation (i.e. coming from Whatsapp / SMS channels)

decodedCustomJWT.description: When the end-user (lead) is strong authenticated this JSON object contains certified info from the authentication provider. To get certified email use {{decodedCustomJWT.email}}. In the same way you can get firstname {{decodedCustomJWT.firstname}}, lastname {{decodedCustomJWT.laastname}} or custom attributes, i.e. {{decodedCustomJWT.attributes.SSN}}

strongAuthenticated.description: Indicates that the current user logged in the chat session with 'strong authentication'

timestamp.description: The current timestamp in millis (Number format)

now.description: The current date in the ISODate format. Ex. 2024-09-25T10:14:41.638Z (String format)

UUID.description: A dynamic generated UUID obtained from a UUIDv4 removing the dashes

voiceLanguage.description: Define the main language for the voice system interpreter

voiceName.description: Define the name of the voice chatbot

event.description: Every handled event during current call flow

lastBlock.description: The last triggered block heard by the caller

lastRecordedUrl.description: The url of the latest recorded audio

ThereWasSomeTroubleConnectingToNetwork: Our apologies. There was some trouble connecting to network

CDSGlobals.NoGlobalVariables:
No global variables

Global variables are a set of variables that are always available in your flows
CDSGlobals.InfoTitle: Use variables to reuse values and protect sensitive data
CDSGlobals.InfoDescription:
Store sensitive data in variables type secret to keep its values masked on the screen.
Work with the current value of a variable to prevent sharing sensitive values with your team
